title: Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Cotton Long Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: CLASSIC STYLE - Relaxed fit for superior comfort, this classic crewneck sits snug around neck and has long-sleeves for your warmth in cooler temperatures. Made to be worn for your best everyday style.
COMFORT - Ribbed knit collar made with Lycra maintains tightness and shape, wash after wash. Made with heavyweight material for added comfort.
DURABLE - Durable quality construction with double-needle bottom hem, and cover seamed cuff and neck with shoulder-to-shoulder tape
QUALITY - Legendary Pro Club quality, keeps shape over time without stretching or sagging. Famous for its casual style, premium material, quality construction and snug neck.
FABRIC CARE – For best washing results and shrink prevention, turn shirt inside out, wash in warm or cool water, and tumble dry low.
Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Cotton Long Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt, 2X-Large, Charcoal
